basic.description: Technological Design Grades 11/12 uses an activity-based, project-driven approach to help you acquire new technical skills, create project resources, design curriculum documents and develop the assessment and evaluation tools you will require to teach this course in your school. In this course, you will explore various topics such as project management, promotional and marketing strategies, technical language and communication methods, drawing standards and conventions, modeling and prototype development and implementation of local and provincial guidelines and policies that promote safe and effective learning environments.
basic.subject: CONT
basic.title: Technological Design Grades 11/12
